*Month Day, Year*

## Introduction
Write your opening hook here. Set the stakes and define the core idea.

## Section Title
Your main argument or story starts here. Keep paragraphs short and scannable.

### Subsection Title
Use subsections to organize longer ideas.

## Conclusion
Close with a clear takeaway or a question for readers.

## Suggested citation (auto-generated)
This site automatically appends a **Suggested citation** block at the bottom of each post page.

Optional front matter overrides:
- `siteCanonical`: use this URL as the canonical blog URL for citation (defaults to `https://prdeepakbabu.github.io/post.html?post=<slug>`).
- `citeKey`: overrides the BibTeX key suffix derived from the slug.

Example:
```yaml
---
title: "Post Title"
date: "2026-02-04"
siteCanonical: "https://prdeepakbabu.github.io/post.html?post=post-title"
citeKey: "posttitle"
---
```
